PackageOracle.name: DA_EQUIP_CONNECTION
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_EQUIP_CONNECTION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.52.582034000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,child_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_connection_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,parent_port_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,child_port_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,channel_bandwidth_measure IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,child_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_equip_connection;

body.name: DA_EQUIP_CONNECTION
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_EQUIP_CONNECTION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.52.592041000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,child_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_connection_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,parent_port_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,child_port_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,channel_bandwidth_measure IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_equip_connection.add, parms=' || parent_equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || child_equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || equipment_connection_reason_cd || '|' || parent_port_address_val || '|' || child_port_address_val || '|' || channel_bandwidth_measure || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_equip_connection a
(
a.parent_equip_prod_inst_id
,a.child_equip_prod_inst_id
,a.equipment_connection_reason_cd
,a.parent_port_address_val
,a.child_port_address_val
,a.channel_bandwidth_measure
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.parent_equip_prod_inst_id
,add.child_equip_prod_inst_id
,add.equipment_connection_reason_cd
,add.parent_port_address_val
,add.child_port_address_val
,add.channel_bandwidth_measure
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_equip_connection.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,child_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_equip_connection.del, parms=' || parent_equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || child_equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_equip_connection a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.parent_equip_prod_inst_id = del.parent_equip_prod_inst_id
AND a.child_equip_prod_inst_id = del.child_equip_prod_inst_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_equip_connection.del');

END del;

END da_equip_connection;
